name: Rownd
long_description:
Rownd is the dynamic backbone for tomorrowâ€™s AI-powered apps, unifying authentication, messaging, payments, and and more into one adaptive platform. 

Our AI-driven platform makes setup a breeze while Rownd's code snippets and SDKs replace static login walls, user management, and subscription management with personalized, context-aware journeys that scale effortlessly. 

Free up to 1 M MAUs, Rownd gives startups and enterprises the runway to innovate boldly and seize market leadership.
one_liner: One platform for auth, messaging, payments & AI-ready services.
